column4: I've been doing about 2 straight days of work trying to get my video card to work
Did I lag out?
Hello, I have been trying to get my video card to work for about two days straight.
Can someone please help me with it?
what kind of video card?
what package?
did you read the wiki already?
what error do you get?
did you install all the requisite packages? The kernel source? What does the installer log say?
does the installer get anywhere, or it just refuses to start?
sudo /etc/init.d/gdm stop <-- that will kill X for you
thank you very much
open a new console (cltr+alt+f1) login and then type sudo /etc/init.d/gdm stop
what client are you using?
yes, it will. Use irssi (a text-based IRC client). It should already be installed, but if it isn't, sudo apt-get install irssi should get it for you.
well that was all I needed, thank you very much for your help
then type 'irssi' to start it up, type /con irc.freenode.net to connect to freenode, and /j #ubuntu to get back in here.
okay
one second
can I use that command to get other packages too?
the wiki has great stuff if you are new to ubuntu. I suggest you browse it.
